t: Fitz and The Tantrums - Fitz and The Tantrums - Amazon.com Music
s: Fitz and The Tantrums' natural exuberance permeates their new self-titled album, which celebrates walking to the beat of your own drum. Lead singer, Michael Fitzpatrick, says of new record, "We've always tried to push ourselves at every turn.

t: Fitz & the Tantrums [VINYL]: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
s: Ich fand es großartig, innovativ und mitreizend. Auch das Folgealbum "More Than Just A Dream" wusste durchaus zu überzeugen. Hier gab es dann schon eine Portion mehr Pop - aber das hat der Sache auf jeden Fall nicht geschadet. Jetzt mit dem neuen Album gehen Fitz and the Tantrums ganz neue Wege.

Fitz & The Tantrums - Songs for a Breakup, Vol. 1 - Amazon.com Music
s: Remember back in the days when the music that came out of Motown had great melodies, lyrics and you could dance to it. Well Fitz and the Tantrums bring it back. Make sure you also get their cd titled Pickin up the Pieces which is is full lenght. This only has five songs but worth the money.
